name: 鄭麗玲
objective:
導覽解說技巧與實務課程旨在介紹各種不同環境、空間與目的之導覽實務，除了學習制式導覽技能，導覽解說人員亦並時時充實各式導覽內容所需相關知識。課程內容包含導覽解說流程、導覽技巧訓練、操作導覽器具、製作導覽手冊、筆記等。
The course aims to introduce various practical skills and techniques for guiding in different environments, spaces, and purposes. In addition to learning formal guiding skills, tour guides are also required to constantly enrich their knowledge of relevant content for various tours. The course content includes the process of tour guiding, training in guiding techniques, operating guiding equipment, creating tour guides brochure, note-taking, and more.
